snippet: Martin Short announced Sunday that he had struck a deal to write his first book, a memoir of his life and enduring career in show business.
abstract: Comedian and actor Martin Short strikes deal with HarperCollins imprint to write memoir; as-yet-untitled book will be released in fall 2014.
lead_paragraph: Martin Short announced Sunday that he had struck a deal to write his first book, a memoir of his life and enduring career in show business.
